metadata.name: I wish I had 100 dollars
metadata.description:
This dynamic $100 bill adjusts daily with the current inflation rate. From the moment it is minted, the denomination is updated with the inflation of the United States.  
On the first transaction only the bill resets to its original $100, so the collector can witness the complete devaluation from the purchase on.

Please note that this dynamic NFT works only on OpenSea (and Zora) for the moment.
